runs.comm: flat on leg to start, worked to deep square leg
rushes down the wicket to blast the ball in the gap through covers. Great shot, made some room and opened up the off side
flat down leg, swept down to short fine leg
veyr flat and quick on middle, clipped to backward square leg
lovely bowling. Slows it right up on middle, Sarkar was shaping for a big sweep but improvised well to keep it out
slog-sweeps this on the ground to deep midwicket
crashed over long-on for a huge hit. good stroke. Stayed in his crease, and launched the heave very high and very far
gone. Sarkar falls. Big wicket. Deafening silence in the crowd. Shortish and wide, Sarkar goes for the cut but gets a thin feather through to the keeper. Bangladesh in a bit of early trouble
full outside off, blocked
short and wide, chopped to mid-off. Looked to hit that too hard
slower ball down leg, worked to short fine leg

Tamim is bowled. Madziva gets another. Both openers are back in the hut. Pressure, pressure. Slower ball on middle, yorker. Tamim looked to flick to the leg side but missed it altogether. The ball hits the stumps and Bangladesh are two down

Sabbir holes out now. Bangladesh are tottering. A nothing full toss outside off, Sabbir offers the full face of the bat and lofts it but long-on runs around and settles underneath to remove Sabbir. Off the to end on that occasion.
full delivery on off, clipped to midwicket
superb shot. Fraught with risk but he gets high return. Backs away to a flat delivery on middle, Shakib guides it to the point boundary

bowled im. Chisoro is jubilant. Shakib is gone now. Goes for a big heave-ho but misses the ball and the leg stump is rattled. Shakib walks back. And the crowd goes even more silent. Bangladesh are reeling
flat outside off, pushed to cover
slowed up nicely outside off, a bit of turn. Defended
picked off his pads to deep square leg for a run
outside off a length delivery. Defended back
fullish and wide, Mahmudullah goes for the drive but gets a thick outside edge which races to the third man boundary
just helped off his pads to the fine leg boundary. Too straight from Madziva and Mahmudullah gets four
very short, very wide. Mahmdullah goes for it and just about reaches, an inside edge rolls to the keeper. Would have been wide
good length outside off, guided to point
flat and quick on off, turned to midwicket
darted in on leg, clipped wide of midwicket for one
tossed up outside off, a thick inside edge rolls down to long-on. Wanted to go over cover
yorker on off, jammed out
flat on off, Kayes defends
worked to midwicket for one
creamed through the covers for flour. Too full, too wide and Kayes dispatches it to the cover boundary
short ball down leg, wide called
fullish length on middle, Kayes finds midwicket
length on middle, Kayes turns to midwicket again
Kayes comes down and launches the swipe way over the square leg boundary. Fantastic timing
slower ball down leg, tickled fine to short fine leg
another boundary. Too full outside off and Kayes leans into this to caress the extra cover drive to the boundary
flat on off, Mahmudullah slog sweeps to the midwicket fielder
slowish outside off, Kayes creams a cut to deep cover
big six. got down early and slog swept it high, way over the midwicket boundary. Great timing. Right in the slot though
tossed up, very wide outside off. Cut fiercely to deep cover

straight down the throat of deep midwicket. A drag down, a rank long-hop. Short on off, Kayes goes back and smashes the pull. But gets more elevation than distance. The deep midwicket fielder settles under it and takes it
slowish on middle, defended
short and wide, poor delivery. Mahmudullah rockets the cut to the point boundary. Exemplary timing
fuller length on off, defended to midwicket
shortish delivery outside off. Climbs a touch. Guided down to third man
lovely touch. Length delivery outside off, Nurul calmly opens the face of the bat to guide it to the third man boundary
runs at the bowler but the bowler drops it short. Awkwardly hit back to long-on
another poor delivery. Short and wide, Mahmudullah smashes it again but deep point cleans up
flat down leg, drifts down leg. Wide called
slower through the air on middle, defended
flat delivery on leg, played quietly to deep midwicket
whipped down to long-on
flat on leg, a bit of miscommunication as the ball drifts to short fine leg off the pad
yorker on off, dug out
worked off the pads to deep midwicket for a run
Chigs starts with a flat slower delivery outside off that sits up for Mahmudullah to loft easily over cover.
yorker on off, clipped to deep midwicket
shortish delivery on middle, Nurul goes for the pull but hits it off the top half of the bat, down to long-on
superb shot but equally good fielding at deep cover from Waller. Very full on off, Mahmudullah times the drive past cover but Waller intervenes
beautiful shot from Mahmudullah. Overpitched outside off, he gives himself room and laces the drive in the air and over long-off for a big six
picked off his pads to deep square leg for a couple of runs
slapped over cover for a couple of runs.Played that with the turn. Good stroke
slower on middle, inside-edged towards midwicket
tickled fine to short fine leg
shortish delivery on off, Nurul goes for the pull but inside-edges onto his pads
flat on leg, a hard sweep to deep square leg earns Nurul one
yorker outside off, smeared out to point
flat on middle, slogged to deep midwicket for a brace. Good running from Niurul, pushing his partner for the second
goes down for a fine paddle, but the umpire adjudicates it a wide. Spun a mile from outside off to leg
flat outside off, creamed to deep cover
yorker outside off, dug out to the bowler but the ball spins away from him
fired in on leg, a leg bye towards fine leg
shortish delivery from around the wicket, crashed to deep cover
premeditates the paddle but Raza bowls this full and wide, beats the bat
up in air and dropped. Down goes an easy opportunity for Zimbabwe. Tossed up and slogged to deep midwicket, the fielder settles under it but cannot hold on
terrific shot. Goes inside out, over cover, with the spin. Easily done from Mahmudullah, keeping his team in the contest
flat on leg, worked to deep midwicket to bring up his fifty. Really good innings this has been
flat outside off, deflected to third man for one
slower and wide outside off, carved to deep point
slow again on middle, patted back to the bowler
fired in on full, worked to midwicket
darted in down leg, wide
fired in down leg, another wide. They get a bye as well

taken this time. Very high full toss outside off, Nurul comes down and looks to smash it over long-off but the ball skews up and Chigumbura backtracks to take the catch. That was just over waist height on impact but he did come down the track to play it. And that is the reason, he has been given.
smashed in the air but on the bounce to deep midwicket. Dragged down very short there
full on off, off the pad towards midwicket
tossed up on middle, Mortaza comes down and flicks the swipe over midwicket. On the bounce and to the boundary
six. Big six. Important six. Raza looking for the blockhole but delivers a full toss. Mortaza comes down and cleanly lofts it over long-on. Made that look rather effortless.
flat on leg, tickled fine to square leg
slower through the air on off, pushed to cover
another six. dragged down short on off, Mortaza goes for the pull and clobbers it easily over the boundary
Mashrafe goes over cover this time. Comes to the pitch and hits it high in the air over cover
googly on middle, played down to fine leg
tossed up on off, defended
flat on middle, pushed to cover
short down leg, pings off the thigh pad towards third man
short down leg, pulled to backward square leg
low full toss down leg, top edge to long-on
bowled im. Massive wicket. Flat on middle and leg, Mahmudullah goes for the slog but the ball goes through and hits the middle and leg stump. The set man goes and an end opens up
flat outside off, a punchy drive finds long-on
lovely yorker outside off, jammed to cover
another good yorker outside off, dug out towards the keeper who runs in, collects and throws the stumps down at the strikers end but the crease has been made
fullish and wide, hit back to the bowler
low full toss outside off, the ball deviates back in to beat the inside edge
low full toss on middle, deflected to the non-striker and towards mid-off
full and wide outside off, smashed to deep cover. Just the one
taken. Is that the game? Full on off, Mortaza launches  drive straight to long-off who makes no mistake. Surely, Bangladesh do not have enough left to win it from here.
low full toss on off, pushed to long-off
lovely yorker outside off, defended
very full outside off, smeared to long-on
full again on off, lofted on the bounce to long-on
big hit. Low full toss on leg. Hider heaves it with all his power over the midwicket boundary. That boundary keeps Bangladesh in it, just!
full and wide, a wide called. Mutumbami throws the stumps down at the strikers end but the batsman has made it back
goes for the cheeky paddle and executes perfectly. low full toss on off, Sunny ramps it over short fine leg. Picked his stroke well

slower ball on off, heaved over towards the midwicket boundary. A fielder runs around and keeps it in. But was his foot in contact with the boundary while the ball was in his hands? Yes, says the umpire. That will be four
bowled im this time. full and straight and Sunny misses his heave. The stumps are rattled. A thick inside edge onto the pad and then onto the stumps
shortish delivery outside off, steered down to third man
that will be a boundary. Full on off, the batsman smashes it back over the bowlers' head for a nice boundary. Important runs
gone. That will be the game. Low full toss outside off, Hider toe-ends the ball to cover as Zimbabwe complete the comeback to level the series 2-2. Would have been a wide if he had left it
